Message:
One day, things took a turn.
Nebra appeared,
wanting to speak to Leader Lucille.

She said she’d come to
discuss a peace agreement,
to stop the conflict between
witches and humans...

Leader Lucille was obviously
opposed to any such talks.

But, as she debated
back and forth with Nebra,
she seemed to be having
so much fun...

I guess Nebra really is
the only one fit to stand
beside Leader Lucille after all...

After more pushing,
Leader Lucille finally
accepted Nebra’s proposal.

I was a bit taken aback,
but I’d always
followed Leader Lucille.
Whatever she believes best
is what I believe, too.

Besides, I’m not fit to stand
by Leader Lucille’s side, anyway.
So...this is how things should be...
